description:

FROM TODAY’S PODCAST: - Ezekiel 47

- Zechariah 14

- Map: Land Allotment for the 12 Tribes

- Episode 037 - The Bible Recap - The Bible Project: "God or gods?"   - The Bible Project: "No Other God"

- The Bible Recap FAQ Page
